website_summaries.verdict: For users who need additional room or height on their existing desk, this model can be placed on an existing work surface to contain overflow items or raise the height of existing monitors or other common office devices.
pros: The 36-inch-by-24-inch size of the desk top on this model is large enough to hold up to 2 monitors, while still being compact enough to leave additional space on average-sized office desks
The adjustable arms raise and lower electrically at the touch of a button
The desk can support up to 90 pounds, and height ranges from 5.7 inches to 18.1 inches
cons: This is a heavy unit, and is difficult to move around between multiple desks

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for back and neck issues
customer_reviews.text: I work from home and spend all day on a computer...laptop on docking station and monitor/keyboard accessories. I first tried the non-electric model but it aggravated my already existing back pain upon raising it up, so the electric lift/lower is the way to go. This has a huge amount of surface space, and has plenty of clearance under it to fit my laptop on a docking station. Sliding keyboard tray is deep enough to fit my keyboard and gel wrist pad, and wide enough for a mouse and gel pad next to it. Overall this desk converter has saved my working life and made me a happier employee!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Parris

customer_reviews.title: out of box, easy!
customer_reviews.text: I have been struggling with the need to move when I work. I had my laptop on boxes and books. Then a friend told me about this company. It took a while before I got the courage to order this desktop Sit to Stand Electric Desk converter. I didn't want a whole new desk, but needed to accommodate multiple monitors and not hurt my back in the process. This desk top converter arrived fully functional. I only needed another set of hands to get it out of the box and up on the desk. It is an excellent investment!
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk. It's spacious enough for me to put a 34" wide LG monitor + a Mac Mini and some other gear on the desk. the beauty of it is that as it goes up and down, it's sturdy enough that virtually nothing loose ( like a pencil holder) shakes or falls over. It is quite large so you will need a desk that is bigger than 36x24 to support this riser. It's also fairly heavy so make sure your desk can handle the weight of this riser + the monitor/computer you put on top of it. I didn't give it 5 stars because virtually nothing is perfect but this desk is pretty close.
customer_reviews.author: GadgetGeek

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: I love this desk top model but it is extremely heavy and hard to move. It also adds 2.5 inches to the desk height so am looking up at the computer. We bought a corner desk at the state supply store and my husband cut the legs down. It works better. I would not buy it again but would spring for a real sit stand desk.
customer_reviews.author: S.O.

customer_reviews.title: Good value desk riser.
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a desk riser that works, and doesn't cost a whole lot, the ApexDesk is an answer. May not be for everyone, since it is somewhat more difficult to lower or raise than some others, but it works fine for me. Solid and well constructed, with more than enough space for two 27-inch screens on top, plus room for my mouse, a legal pad and a cup of coffee. The lower tier fits my oversized keyboard. Like the idea that one can infinitely vary the height, and, when we want to sit, lower it pretty close to about six inches from our desk top and raise my seat height.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Love my electronic rising desk converter!
customer_reviews.text: I a, so happy with my new height adjusted desk converter. I love that it works with the touch of a Botton. The USB on the side has been very useful. Great for charging my mobile, iPod and Fitbit. I chose this converter because the keyboard was retractable. I am so happy. This is a feature I very much enjoy. Especially since I use my personal keypad and a second work keyboard (since working 100% from home due to COVID-19). Very happy with my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja fruit and greens McKinney

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable desk improves my work experience
customer_reviews.text: This desk is great! It Is sturdy and goes up and down easily for standing or sitting. It puts the monitor where I am not slouching to view it. The pullout keyboard is wonderful and gets the keyboard out of the way when not in use. No real assembly. My one complaint is that it only has one USB port and I wish it had two, but otherwise I’m very happy. I have been using this for a month and a half and I feel it is better for my back health.
customer_reviews.author: S. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Better than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I love this stand up desk! It is perfect! No assembly required. Even with both of my big monitors I still have plenty of room for paperwork. It’s sleek. Lots of compliments from my coworkers. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy O.

customer_reviews.title: Product is very good, but the keyboard table came apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 first. The product is sturdy, easy to use and useful as described. I felt good about it and really like it. Then I bought 2 more. The keyboard table supposes to come together with the desk. But one of the keyboard tables fell apart when it delivered. As shown in the picture, the holes in keyboard were stripped. The holes in keyboard table are broken. I hope the seller can help me fix the issue. Otherwise, I may have to return it. Update: I contacted customer support. Problem solved. I am pleased with the desk and the support.
customer_reviews.author: Gates

customer_reviews.title: I have used it for several weeks now and I Love it. Took a week to get use to ...
customer_reviews.text: It was delivered promptly. I have used it for several weeks now and I Love it. Took a week to get use to it and standing. I have my laptop on it plus a 23 inch monitor and I have room for all my papers. I also have room for my mouse and my keyboard on the small shelf. It goes down easily but is a little tougher to pull up but is manageable. Works perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Robin VanHorn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for home use
customer_reviews.text: During these shelter in place order situation, I found that I needed a standing desk at home. Instead of ordering a full-size one, I ordered this item and placed it on top of my stationary desk. it’s worked out really good. I use it every day, it’s sturdy, versatile and I love the charging port.
customer_reviews.author: T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Have over the course of the year purchased six of these desks for my staff. One was slightly off level - we returned with no problem, got a refund and ordered a replacement - all in timely fashion. We love the desks. They don't have as large a footprint as the Varidesks (which some of my staff have), they easily hold two monitors, mouse, , papers, etc. (we have the 36"). Moves smoothly and quietly. No bouncing or wobbling despite all the gear on it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: IHEAdmin

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, will suggest!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built product with seemingly endless adjustability for any height. At 5’10” I do not prefer it to be at its highest setting. First stand up desk purchase and not disappointed at all, the budget is the cherry on top! Only negative I would say just for feedback purposes, the keyboard tray seems to be smaller than your standard size. With my mechanical keyboard it leaves just enough room for mouse movement but my mousepad doesn’t fit properly, it would also not allow for a wrist wrest to be used with a keyboard. Plenty desktop space would makeup for this if anyone does find it completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: Solid riser, plenty of space for monitors
customer_reviews.text: The ApexDesk feels very solid. It has sufficient space for two good-size (24" I think) monitors on the top, and a full size keyboard on the tray, although with the keyboard there, the space for the mouse is a bit cramped. It was extremely easy to put together, as there were only two foot pads to attach via some screws. Lifting the riser does take just a bit of effort. For me it is not hard (6" tall male), but I suspect for someone who is smaller and perhaps not as strong it would require a bit of effort. Slightly more powerful hydraulics would probably solve this problem. Overall, I am quite pleased with this desk riser.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D. Gallaher

customer_reviews.title: If only the keyboard tray was adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: It would be five stars if the keyboard tray was adjustable. The desk is sturdy, well-made, and required no assembly on arrival. The motorized up-down makes it super easy to switch positions frequently through the day. The USB port on the side is a nice bonus. BUT! The keyboard tray is at a fixed position, and both in sitting and standing modes it is too high for me. After just one week of using the desk, I've replaced the hip and back pain from sitting all day with elbow and wrist pain from extensive typing in a terrible hand position. If anyone has solved this problem while retaining the excellent features of this desk, I'd love some input.
customer_reviews.author: msc80305

customer_reviews.title: Apex Desk ZT series
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this product for any office, or home office. It's a little heavy, but fits on top of your existing desk. The push of a button raises or lowers. It has done wonders for my back and legs. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: miccingen

customer_reviews.title: Defintely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for our company for people needing standing desks and I have to say these exceed our expectations. Our company liked it so much our other sites across the US are now buying these as well. (the original were manual standing desk, instead of electric)
customer_reviews.author: Ian Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required, just put it on your desk and plug it in :) perfect for 2 monitors. When I was shopping for this sit to stand desk I decided to go for this one because of 2 main things: 1. It is electric and 2. It had the keyboard tray which helps give me more desk space when i don' t need to type. Love it :) my coworkers are slowly getting theirs too :)
customer_reviews.author: Elyana Delro

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: Great item, works just as good as the desks that are much higher priced, my co-worker has one of those. I use this for work and love the option of standing most of the time, but still have the option to sit. I have two screens and a docking station sitting on the top part, keyboard and mouse on the bottom part. This product is heavy duty and can take someone lightly leaning on it when all the way extended. I'm 6'2 and assume, when using a normal height desk, that it is not made for someone much taller than myself.
customer_reviews.author: Erin S.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely pleased; great value!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received and it is awesome! Pull out of the box, attach 2 plates on the bottom (rubber bottom plates to provide protection against sliding on your desk) and you are good to go! Easy to move up and down. I am 5'6 and I am comfortable standing at halfway. It has plenty of room for additional height. Very sturdy and fits 2 large monitors and laptop in the middle. My laptop screen is not in use so I have the monitors in front of it, but it all fits comfortably. Overall, great value! Extremely pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: MGor

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Product was well packaged and arrived in perfect condition. Stand is sturdy. Moves up and down easily with the push of a button. Stand is large however I have a laptop and 2 monitors on top plus my mouse so I appreciate the roominess. I appreciate the phone charge. I am happy that I purchased this sit and stand unit. I will need a keyboard now because it sit up high.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Has made my days at the office much easier on my back. I stay more energized when I can opt to stand and work. Easy to use, no set up involved unless you are permanently attaching it to your desk. It is heavy enough that that is not necessary.
customer_reviews.author: lffannin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy stand but keyboard tray doesn't lock in place
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a stable riser but keyboard tray doesn't lock in place making it practically useless. Go to type and it slides right out from under your hands. Unreal.
customer_reviews.author: Lex Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Value purchase. Fnctional given price point.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Fairly easy to put up but harder, although manageable, to put down. Good value relative to other prices in stores and online of competitors with similar products. Came in less 24 hrs. Caveat emptor. Don't put it up all the way or its nearly impossible to put down. Leave one rung from the top. This is how I scratched my desk (see pic). This why it gets four stars not 3.
customer_reviews.author: Judson Ames

customer_reviews.title: Practically free today! All gain, no pain
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic solution and basically free during COVID-19 shelter in place! Fully assembled out of the box, plug and play! Immediately provided sit/stand at home for a very reasonable price! Full ergonomic solution during shelter in place for COVID-19. Since I’m not driving to the office daily, money I saved on gas for my truck paid for this solution with zero financial impact to me. All gain, no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Schranz

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient, I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! So nice and sturdy. I wasn’t sure if I was going to use the USB port on the side until my Bluetooth keyboard run out of batteries, that was just so convenient. super happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Guisselle

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: At first I was unsure of the size and how much desk space it took. I need my desk space to do my job. But after using it for almost a week I have to say that I love it.The height adjustment is perfect for standing or sitting. I find myself standing 99% of my day. I have lower back problems, and I have had significantly less pain in my lower back while at work. Overall I would say it has gone well and I can' wait to continue standing!
customer_reviews.author: moki

customer_reviews.title: which was very easy to do for a replacement
customer_reviews.text: The first desk rose and returned okay, but the tray would not pull out, so I returned it, which was very easy to do for a replacement. The replacement model, when I went to raise the desk up pulled the tray off, screws and all, so I’m returning it and will try another type.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product at excellent price
customer_reviews.text: My wife needed a flexible desk to alleviate lower back pain. We purchased this. It is fully assembled, and works perfectly. Be aware it is kind of heavy, but that is a good quality. Electric powered is the way to go with these.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie DeAngelis

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy to rise!
customer_reviews.text: The product is very heavy, seems to tip easily with multiple monitors, and is very hard to rise and lower. It's not ideal for commercial office use with multiple monitor setup. It's simply not easy to use and is very heavy to rise. We tried it on several workstations and all users complained about the force required to raise the desktop.
customer_reviews.author: SoBayCPA

customer_reviews.title: I love my ApexDesk
customer_reviews.text: I love my ApexDesk! After 25 years of sitting behind a desk, it's wonderful to be able to stand when I want to. It's wide enough to hold both my monitors plus a lamp and deep enough to give me the writing room I need as well. The sliding keyboard shelf is also a good feature. A few of my co-workers got a different brand and their keyboard shelves don't move. It's nice to be able to slide it under, out of the way when I don't need it. I've had no problems with the up/down movement, it glides easily at the push of the button. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura E.

customer_reviews.title: Good product at reasonable cost compared to the alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase and would have given five stars, but the keyboard tray has some play to it which I foresee will only worsen over time.
customer_reviews.author: RAK

customer_reviews.title: But I unpacked after few days in my office and was disappointed once seeing a little crash on the desk
customer_reviews.text: Received the item on time! But I unpacked after few days in my office and was disappointed once seeing a little crash on the desk. Contacted the seller and now waiting for response... generally no others issue and the vary desk works fine as expected. Liked the item but giving 3 stars only for issue above.
customer_reviews.author: Ttran6754

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great substitute to sitting all day. Helps sufferers of back problems. Does all the same functions of of a desk double the price. Holds weight and fits two full monitors. Lower desk fits a default sized keyboard but not additional mouse
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Would Definately Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift. Daughter absolutely loves it and is the envy of the law office. No assembly required and easy to set up. Very functional and electric up and down the best.
customer_reviews.author: BJB

customer_reviews.title: downfall to this sit/stand desk is the keyboard. It ...
customer_reviews.text: downfall to this sit/stand desk is the keyboard. It sits up about 5 inches off the desk if you are sitting, it would be a five star if the keyboard tray sat on the desktop. It’s a pull out drawer and it should also drop down. Hard to use in sitting position.
customer_reviews.author: C. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Was packaged well and very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived as anticipated. Was packaged well and very easy to set up. Is definitely a heavy product. Works exactly as it should. I do love being able to stand up at work. When it's in the down position, my computer monitors are slightly higher than I would like, but it's not enough to discourage me. I do recommend this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Thompke1

customer_reviews.title: Beautfil and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this sit stand desk. It very smoothly goes up and down. I love the pull out tray for the key board. The desk when sitting is a bit to high but I plan on standing most of the time anyways. It is very sturdy, I have a large monitor on it and it has no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Martin

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This is well built and very sturdy, has a nice upper surface to put papers and write notes on, and is reasonably easy to move up and down. I really have zero complaints about this and would recommend it to anyone. You can't beat it for the price ($200 at the time of this writing).
customer_reviews.author: Eegah

customer_reviews.title: It's great to be able to stand at my desk job
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my personal use at work, but now the company purchases them to meet ADA requests for stand-up desks. It's great to have the ability to either sit or stand at any point during the day.
customer_reviews.author: lmwaagen

customer_reviews.title: Love this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk! Easy, fast set up right out of the box. Looks great. Very sturdy and well built. I leave it as a stand up desk at all times, so I have not had to collapse it up and down to rate that except to say it takes just a little bit more pressure to go down than the more expensive brands. But for the price this has met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing about this desk that I don't like
customer_reviews.text: Fits on my desk and having the extra phone jack for my i-phone on the side is a bonus. I would recommend this desk to anyone. You need to purchase a good foam mat meant for stand up desk if you use this.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Freeland

customer_reviews.title: Great desk. Haven’t sat down since I got it
customer_reviews.text: Product is perfect except for the slide out for keyboard. You MUST soak it down overnight with WD-40 or it will break. Otherwise I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, well made
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a Desk Riser for her work so we did some searching and decided upon the ApexDesk. It turned out to be an excellent choice. It's very sturdy and big enough for 2 monitors. She's been using it now for 3 days and loves it because she can work while sitting or standing... her choice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The electric moving makes it so easy to go up and down and is extremely quite. The top desk is very large and have room for my monitor, adding machine and writing area. I love it and have been highly recommending it. I got the walnut color and really happy with the color.
customer_reviews.author: Office worker in Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: nice but has design flaws.
customer_reviews.text: The desk is a nice size, has enough room for two monitors, mouse pad, and keyboard. lifts up and down easily. The problem is the keyboard holder is mounted with six small screws that screw directly into the particle board with no additional support. The first time I applied pressure to it, it broke. All six screws came out of the particle board. I could have drilled new holes and reattached it but for the price I just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice, smooth operation
customer_reviews.text: Holds my 2 large monitors and keyboard. Like the tray, easy to slide in and out. Smooth operation. USB charger port is nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mom24

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard does not lock so when typing it moves inwards and outwards on retractable tract.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the keyboard when extended out had a lock feature so when you type on it the tray does not move back and forth. Had to place two butterfly clips on the keyboard track to stop it from moving... Is there a lock fix with the keyboard that I am missing or is it like this normally? Love the rest of the desk...
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic option for desk job! Absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: Best money spent for work. I love my new desk: it allows me to stand-sit-stand without distracting my co-workers. I'm 5'8" and it's perfect height for me. My colleagues all love it and some are ordering their own. So easy and quiet to adjust. You won't be sorry, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: AMBP

customer_reviews.title: part time user
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting used to standing up and am still finding the right height for the screen. It is very hard to move down and the directions do not seem correct but the price is good and it is well made and sturdy - I would recommend as long as you have a strong person to work the adjustments in height
customer_reviews.author: fun book reads

customer_reviews.title: Technical writers, get help for your English!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this item for a few days, so I'll perhaps have some additional words later. But, so far, so good. Setting it up was made more difficult by nonsensical, far too obtuse English instructions. Get a new technical writer! Otherwise, the product is being useful and promises to continue to be so in days ahead.
customer_reviews.author: nils friberg

customer_reviews.title: It was great, so we ordered three more
customer_reviews.text: We ordered one for our office to see how it fit and would work. It was great, so we ordered three more. The unit came packed well. Once out of the packing material you sit it on the desktop, plug it in, and it is ready to go. On our second order of three, one of the keyboard trays was getting hung up. I sent an email through their website and received an answer the same day letting me know how to fix the issue. I would highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Mona S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my adult daughter and she loves it. Took it to work and all the techy people were so jealous.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Well made product, happy to be standing!
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is an extremely well made standing desk topper. Everyone in my office is trying to convince our CEO to purchase desk risers for all of us. (I bought mine with personal funds, worth it!) It is very easy to raise and lower the desk and has enough room for my comp accessories and any paperwork I may be using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: No assembly required, solid, electrical lift works smooth. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ALM

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Heavy out of the box, but easy to assemble and works great!
customer_reviews.author: ABookAtTheBeach

customer_reviews.title: Great especially if you WFH.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. I work from home and found myself only sitting for hours! Not anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Complete review after resolution of keyboard tray.
customer_reviews.text: I think I will like it. Just unpacked, but keyboard on right side does not pull out...it is right and only pulls out less than half way. I’ll follow up after I can contact someone for help with the keyboard tray issue otherwise I will need to exchange it.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Love my desk riser
customer_reviews.text: Love my desk riser. I’ve had it for over a year and would highly recommend getting one. It’s amazing quality and I love being able to stand and still work.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina Dew

customer_reviews.title: but when sitting my ergonomic position is not good..
customer_reviews.text: It sits a bit high off the desk.. Which is a problem for me, because with my monitors ontop of the desk, they are actually TOO tall for when I sit.. So basically I can stand now, but when sitting my ergonomic position is not good... But the product is very nice and the quality is definitely there.
customer_reviews.author: bryan seidel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Price
customer_reviews.text: As defined. Stable. Not a ton of shaking like cheap competitors (had to ship a few back that were just weak and not as described). If you're looking for an affordable standing desk, look no further. Lots of space around the desk and a very comfy and open platform.
customer_reviews.author: ANGELA VO

customer_reviews.title: Keeper
customer_reviews.text: We like it. Lots of room and easy to use. Saved a lot of money too. :l
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiiguy1213

customer_reviews.title: I do enjoy being able to stand at work
customer_reviews.text: I do enjoy being able to stand at work. The desk is well made and easy to put together. My only complaint is that when it is raised to it's highest level and I adjust my two screens to their highest level, I still need to put printer paper under my two screens to add just a little bit more height, otherwise my head would be bent down slightly to look directly in the middle of my two screens. I am 5'9 for reference.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Easy transition
customer_reviews.text: we love this product. it's easy to use and gives us the choice of standing up while we are working or not.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E Hetherington

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worth my money! This has helped my ergonomic set up at work. It is a little large but made for two monitors, I love the electric component.... I do not have to worry about manually raising it or lowering it myself! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: J&A

customer_reviews.title: Saved my back!
customer_reviews.text: I love my desk! I sit at a computer all day for work and my back would get so sore. Since I have this desk I feel so much better at the end of the day! I recommend it to anyone who works at a desk all day.
customer_reviews.author: Marykay Stein

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described. It is heavier to lift than I expected, but still goes up and down smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Lighter (and much cheaper) than the Veridesk so its easier for our employees to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: The desk itself is a great size and shape but when you put everything you ...
customer_reviews.text: The desk itself is a great size and shape but when you put everything you need on it it becomes really heavy and hard to lift because of where the handles are. It hurts my back when I lift it up.
customer_reviews.author: kas1988

customer_reviews.title: Quality on a budget - Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Think that half the price of the most advertised brad is half the quality? Think again. This unit holds two 24" Dell UltraSharp monitors with ease. Lifts and lowers smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: DDF

customer_reviews.title: This desk is awesome! It does everything I need it to do ...
customer_reviews.text: This desk is awesome! It does everything I need it to do and more. The edges which protrude from the front come in handy for jotting down a note or leaning my elbow on. The only reason I did not give five stars is because for a short woman like me, it can be a struggle (tiny, but nonetheless a reality) to bring the desk up and down. I do need to lean forward and apply pressure to push it down and must lean back and use that leverage to bring it back up. A small price to pay for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this desk!
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable desktop converter is sturdy enough to hold my 27" imac and I can lower and raise it with the push of the button. I'm so glad that I spent the extra money for the powered version. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: stopped working 2 months after I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for one of our asst County Managers, and it stopped working after 3 months. It's been VERY glitchy and has not been reliable. I wish I'd returned it the moment it stopped working properly
customer_reviews.author: L.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have been extremely happy with this product. It shipped fast, was well packaged and was exactly as advertised at a very competative price. I have been price shopping similar desks for months and held off in purchasing due to cost. The up and down function took some adjustment of the hydraulics to smoothly transition based on the weight I had on the desk. The work surface is very stable to work off of. It was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn E. Fabian

customer_reviews.title: This unit is VERY sturdy and heavy built
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife who works a desk job from home. She says she LOVES it !!!! Doesn't t have to stay sitting down all day long !! Can stand up and stretch her legs and still work efficiently. This unit is VERY sturdy and heavy built, not something flimsy at all. Would recommend this for anyone who is interested in buying an item like this.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Welsh

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this desk riser! Arrived completely assembled (except for two small feet to add which was easy)! I find it very easy to raise and lower now that I got the hang of it! When raising, I find it easier to sort of pull towards me as I am raising it. Thanks for a great product at a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Love the ApexDesk
customer_reviews.text: Love the ApexDesk. Other colleagues in my office have the VariDesk which looks very sleek but I went with the ApexDesk. I'm so glad I did because I have more "desk/writing" area and it was half the price. One colleague noticed mine had more desk area and preferred mine over her VariDesk. Adjusting the desk is easy too. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Solid but not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Adjusting up and down is not easy as I thought. The keyboard holder is stuck. Not easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I bought the manual riser and absolutely love it. Very easy to raise up and down
customer_reviews.text: I bought the manual riser and absolutely love it. Very easy to raise up and down. Very roomy. I keep my laptop and a monitor on it with plenty of room for a note pad, phone charger, mouse and more.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy James

customer_reviews.title: Solid well designed Riser. If you're in an office your coworkers will be jealous.
customer_reviews.text: Desk Riser comes almost fully assembled, comfortably fits 2 monitors, raises and lowers easily. Would have given 5 stars but the adhesive on the rubber part of the feet is weak; one of the rubber pieces came off while putting the unit in my car.. Overall the desk is fantastic and well built. I believe it's well worth the money, and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Strobel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT choice!
customer_reviews.text: We have been implementing sit/stand desks in the work place and this is by far our most favorite one that we have tried. I have purchased several. Easy to set up, easy to use. Very sturdy. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: AFeyerherm

customer_reviews.title: Unbox and you are good to go
customer_reviews.text: Got here really quickly. No installation needed everything already setup just take out the box and go.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lift
customer_reviews.text: This desk replaced one for a co-worker who thought the other style was too hard to lift. She said this was is easier.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hoenisch

customer_reviews.title: Nice riser. kinda hard to elevate and it raised ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice riser.kinda hard to elevate and it raised my monitors and key board so high that my chair wouldn't raise high enough so have to sit on cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Stillwell

customer_reviews.title: It is awesome. and good price I recommend for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Now I don't have to setting down all to do my work, I can stand up and work whenever I need to. It is awesome. and good price I recommend for everyone. thank you, James H. Industry Designer San Diego, CA
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very well built stand up desk. Ready to put up and down.
customer_reviews.author: Surelypberg

customer_reviews.title: Great stand up desk
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use it everyday at work. I do wish it had some extensions to make the work area a little larger.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to move up and down. A great addition to my office to assist in weight loss by not sitting all day. If you buy make sure you get an anti fatigue mat to stand on
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Standing is so much better than sitting. Large enough for a second screen
customer_reviews.author: Garoovy

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I like it so far. It is not easy to put up and down, at least as easy as I thought. It is solid though and would recommend for the price. I've only owned it for a couple of weeks, so it has yet to stand a longevity test!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When received the screws to the keyboard were already striped ...
customer_reviews.text: When received the screws to the keyboard were already striped. Other than send it back we got larger screws and replaced them.
customer_reviews.author: SGraves

customer_reviews.title: Potential to break during everyday use
customer_reviews.text: We have installed 30+ of these units in our offices. Of those we have had to replace 5 or 6 due to the metal support bracket ripping out of the work surface.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this desk
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this desk! Solid, stable, easily holds 2 monitor and still has space for notes, etc. The many positions let anyone from 5'3 to 6'2 use it. Reasonable price, minimal assembly
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only been using this 2 days but love it so far
customer_reviews.text: Only been using this 2 days but love it so far. It is really nice to be able to easily move from sitting and standing. I wish it was an inch higher when in the standing position but other than that it is just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Great item for less money than the number one brand
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item I can't find any difference from the Varidesk brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Been using this desk for a few days now. Holds both of my computer screens, rises up high (I'm tall), fast power lift, was already assembled when I got it, just an all-around win, exceeded expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren DuFresne

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. It also actually gives you more desk space because you place items under it.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: No more shoulder and neck pain!! Just need better shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Ann Ross

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: packaging was great, set-up was a snap. absolutely love it ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surdy Product but USB Connector not working
customer_reviews.text: Love Unit except the usb connector port does not work. Need replacement port connector.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

product_meta.title: ApexDesk EDR-3612-BLACK ZT Series Height Adjustable Sit to Stand Electric Desk Converter, 2-Tier Design with Large 36x24" Upper Work Surface and Lower Keyboard Tray Deck (Electric Riser, Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Electric Riser, BlackDue to popular demand, we have now motorized our desk risers - convert any traditional desk into a standing one with a simple push of a button! 

➢ MOTORIZED HEIGHT ADJUSTMENTS
It features a motorized lifting system, making it a breeze adjusting height. Also because of the integrated motor, weight capacity is 3 times as much as the traditional manual risers! No more squeezing, pulling and pushing. Let the ZT Series do the hefty lifting for you! With an ample height range of 5.7" to 18.1", you can now easily switch from sitting to standing by pushing the UP or DOWN button .It also comes with a convenience USB port for charging small electronic devices. 

➢ LARGE WORK SURFACE 
Fits two monitors and more! Upper deck measures 36” x 24”, enough room for two 22” monitors and other gadgets. Lower deck measures 25” x 9.5” and is able to fit any full size keyboards and mouse. Both upper and lower decks are made with high-pressure, scratch-resistant Melamine laminate with high density MDF core - very stable and maintenance free. 

➢ NO INSTALLATION REQUIRED
Ready to use right out of the box! Just plug in power! Enjoy the convenience of sitting and standing without breaking an arm and a leg!

FEATURES

✔ Fully motorized with powerful electric motor. One simple push of a button lowers or raises the desk to any position between 5.7 to 18.1.” 
✔ Two-tier design. Upper surface size is 36 x 24" and large enough for two monitors. Lower surface is 25" x 9.5", retractable and large enough for a full-size keyboard. 
✔ Add up to 18.1" to your existing work surface. Sturdy and stable even at highest position. 
✔ Up and down movement. The desk rises and lowers within its own foot print. 
✔ Fully assembled. NO installation required. Static load capacity is 90 lbs and dynamic load capacity is 45 lbs. One integrated USB port included.
feature_bullets: ✔ Fully motorized with powerful electric motor. One simple push of a button lowers or raises the desk to any position between 5.7 to 18.1.”
✔ Two-tier design. Upper surface size is 36 x 24" and large enough for two monitors. Lower surface is 25" x 9.5", retractable and large enough for a full-size keyboard.
✔ Add up to 18.1" to your existing work surface. Sturdy and stable even at highest position.
✔ Up and down movement. The desk rises and lowers within its own foot print.
✔ Fully assembled. NO installation required. Static load capacity is 90 lbs and dynamic load capacity is 45 lbs. One integrated USB port included.
